channel.title: Hi i need help with the foloing....(please)
channel.description:
hi i need help with the foloing....(please) --this is were il post everything i need help with.
*i need to add fully working range. -if theres a tut on this please give me the link,if not this is a request please.-
*i need to know how to change the price of items in my shops. -if theres a tut on this please give me the link,if not this is a request please.-
***[pimpscape based]***
it hasnt worked heres a expample of wat i did, item = 2428 Attack_potion(4) 4_doses_of_attack_potion. 14.3847440308156 item = 2428 Attack_potion(4) 4_doses_of_attack_potion. 300000000.3847440308156 it made no diffrence to the shop.

item.title: Hi i need help with the foloing....(please)
item.dc:creator: @bigshot154 bigshot154
item.description:
@bigshot154 wrote:

i no but the price in the shop doesnt change

Read full topic

just change the #1 after "These_could_be_handy.
to whatever price you want

item.source: Hi i need help with the foloing....(please)

item.title: Hi i need help with the foloing....(please)
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

go into your shop.cfg...look for the item ID you want to change

EXAMPLE:

item = 1129 Leather_body SHOP EXAMINE SHOP PRICE HIGH ALCH LOW ALCH Change the first number for shop price…second number for high alch value…and the third number for low alch value

Read full topic

item.title: Hi i need help with the foloing....(please)
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

for shop prices…
look in item.cfg for your item id
IE:

item = 1129    Leather_body     SHOP PRICE     HIGH ALCH    LOW ALCH

that is what you would change…
and the rest of the numbers are bonuses…leave those as is for now

item.source: Hi i need help with the foloing....(please)

item.title: Hi i need help with the foloing....(please)
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

[code][code] go into player.java and search for

giving the player a unique look

you should see something similar to this

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=1050; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6570; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=3140; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087; playerEquipment[playerHands]=7462; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3105; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

change the ItemId’s to what you would like…-1 = no item
and they state whether it weapon,ring,cape, etc.

[quote=“bigshot154, post:1, topic:100306”]*i need to know how to change wats in my shops,i have but i get a error when i change shops.cfg.
-if theres a tut on this please give me the link,if not this is a request please.-[/quote]
open up shops.cfg
here is an example of what a shop would look like
[/code]shop = 1 @whi@Random Stuff 1 1 ITEMID ITEM-AMOUNT[/code]

shop = 1 - shop id number...only need if adding a command to open it, etc. @whi@Random Stuff -Title that appears at top of shop window 1 1 -has something to do with if you can sell items or not(dont change) ITEMID -ID of what item you would like to add... ITEM-AMOUNT - amound of item you would like to see
USE TABS FOR THE SPACING
here is a sample of what 1 of my shops look like

shop = 1	@whi@Random Stuff				1	1	1931	5	1935	2	1735	2	1925	3	1923	2	1887	2	590	2	1755	2	2347	5	550	5	6070	20	4151	500	3842	500	3844	500	561	500	4675	500	391	5000	397	5000	385	5000	4153	500	3840	10000	2446	100	7336	1	293	1	6959	100

[quote=“bigshot154, post:1, topic:100306”]*i need to add fully working range without arrows.
-if theres a tut on this please give me the link,if not this is a request please.-[/quote]
I’m sorry, but i do not know how to change this

Sorry about the first part of my post…it has a stupid [code] thing[/code]

Read full topic
